notes.text: Exploitable remotely/low attack complexity. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an authenticated user to escape from the context of the streamed application into the OS and launch arbitrary OS commands.. CRITICAL INFRASTRUCTURE SECTORS: Chemical, Critical Manufacturing, Energy, Food and Agriculture, and Water and Wastewater Systems. COUNTRIES/AREAS DEPLOYED: Worldwide

notes.text: Windows OS can be configured to overlay a “language bar” on top of any application. When this OS functionality is enabled, the OS language bar UI will be viewable in the browser alongside the InTouch Access Anywhere and Plant SCADA Access Anywhere applications. It is possible to manipulate the Windows OS language bar to launch an OS command prompt, resulting in a context-escape from application into OS.
